subject: Order #SSN2118
description_text:
Hi,

I would like to cancel part of my order please. I didn't realise that the
Pro X ultra pedals already came with the upgrade kit so I would like to
drop the upgrade kit from the order please and get that part refunded.

Kind Regards,
Taylor Lane

conversations.body_text: Hi Taylor Lane,    Okay, we have refunded your upgrade kit.
